entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued January 23 at 11:58PM AKST until January 24 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...SNOW AND FREEZING RAIN DIMINISH THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... .Snowfall continues across parts of the northern panhandle, but many areas have begun to see rain mix in as temperatures have warmed.
